channel.title: GamerCraft - PvP - Survial - and much more :) 1.4_01 - Looking For OPs
channel.description:
Hey guys come join GamerCraft a new server! Online-Mode = False (Although Legally Owned server) Many mods installed SERVER: MC.GAMERWAGERS.COM:25565 Fourm For problems : Gamerwagers.com (Remove if Against rules)
COMMANDS: READ /register (password) -- Must use /login (password) -- Must use /jobs - Make money! /money - see money! /shop -Buy suplys /sethome set your home! /home teleport - go home! /icl - Buy sell claim land! See ingame @spawn how to secure chests and doors online mode = false Build or DIE PVP NO GREIFING NO STEALING
Thanks :)

item.title: GamerCraft - PvP - Survial - and much more :) 1.4_01 - Looking For OPs
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:3, topic:392204”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=489370.msg3577944#msg3577944 date=1303579088]
/money? /shops?

This sounds like an rsps…
[/quote]

He’s using a sort of iConomy plugin for the server which allows for RPG purposes such as creating cities and such with currency and other things of the sort.[/quote]

Ah ok. I dislike a currency in minecraft. Bartering keeps the game going.

Read full topic

Hey guys come join GamerCraft a new server!
Online-Mode = False (Although Legally Owned server)
Many mods installed
SERVER: MC.GAMERWAGERS.COM:25565
Fourm For problems : Gamerwagers.com (Remove if Against rules)

COMMANDS: READ
/register (password) – Must use
/login (password) – Must use
/jobs - Make money!
/money - see money!
/shop -Buy suplys
/sethome set your home!
/home teleport - go home!
/icl - Buy sell claim land!
See ingame @spawn how to secure chests and doors
online mode = false
Build or DIE
PVP
NO GREIFING
NO STEALING

Thanks
